name: Diet-Nova Check_cloud_80_v2.0.230
description: v2.0.230: Fixed Day/Week print layouts. Added customizable print options for Serves, Kcal, and detailed Macro/Alternative tables. Added meal duration to printed output. v2.0.229: Unified red highlighting for '/' and brackets in search, bulk format, and print. v2.0.228: Enhanced auto rich text bulk formatting to include forward slashes '/' along with bracketed numbers for better visual clarity in meal plans. v2.0.227: Dynamic Quick Diet Templates from cloud DB with status indicator. v2.0.226: Fixed cloud mapping for diet templates to ensure all fields are filed. v2.0.225: Migrated Diet Templates to Supabase cloud database.
